userDisconnectionProcedure(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States.GameState
Handles disconnection of a user from the game.
This method prepares the game for later player removal, it does not directly remove the player (the removal will be triggered by the outside lobby by calling the remove method).
userDisconnectionProcedure(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States.Implementations.MainLoop
Handles user disconnection.
If the user that disconnected was the current player then it makes the next player the current to avoid getting stuck on a disconnected player.
